title: Mordekaiser needs a statue
body:
{{champion:82}} 
Who else thinks this guy right here needs a statue? or even a figure.
Mordekaiser is one of the most bad ass looking champions in LoL I mean look at this bastard 
https://feen.us/4ycw39.png

Pentakill Mordekaiser would make an amazing piece on anyone's shelf.

Come on Rito I believe in you.
